title: [巴打想問有無咩可以改善] 砌機list

replies.msg:
用開premiere pro, photoshop
平時打開fortnite, apex
諗住用5年
好同唔好都可以講聲



CPU: Ryzen 7 3800x
GPU: Zotac RTX 2060 SUPER AMP
(唔用rx5700xt因為真係太多driver問題)
Motherboard: MSI B450 TOMAHAWK MAX
RAM: FLARE X DDR4 3200 c14 2x8GB
Storage: Samsung 650 Evo SSD500GB
(諗緊用唔用 pilot nvme pcle m.2 500GB)
(本身有seagate 1TB)
Power Supply: Corsair rm750x
Monitor: AOC 24G2


Total: 11000 頂盡㗎啦
各位巴打對個list俾啲意見
讚同彈都接受

成皮先2060S..
9400F+ 2070S都無咁嬲
